fastDFE

Miscellaneous

Logging

fastDFE uses the standard Python logging module for logging. By default, fastDFE logs to the console at the INFO level. You can change the logging level, to DEBUG for example, after importing fastdfe by doing as follows:

import fastdfe, logging

logging.getLogger('fastdfe').setLevel(logging.DEBUG)

You can also disable the progress bar like this:

fastdfe.disable_pbar = True

Debugging

If you encounter an unexpected error, you can disable parallelization to obtain a more descriptive stack trace (see parallelize in BaseInference).

import fastdfe

fastdfe.parallelize = False

# … run your code here …

fastdfe.parallelize = True

Seeding

fastDFE is seeded by default to ensure reproducibility (see seed in BaseInference, Parser, etc.). Randomness is required when bootstrapping, choosing initial values for different optimization runs, and when parsing the SFS from VCF files which requires taking random subsamples.
